update delivery_receitp set company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isvxvip = #{isvxvip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shop_num = #{shopNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_shelf_num = #{goodsShelfNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, others = #{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_personnum = #{companyPersonnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, duty_paragraph = #{dutyParagraph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_way = #{payWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, iscommit = #{iscommit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, interface_id = #{interfaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_bill_way = #{payBillWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shop_discount = #{shopDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, submit_time = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, checkStatus = #{checkstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, checkRemark = #{checkremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unqualifiedNum = #{unqualifiednum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
(SELECT dr.*,pu.`user_name` interfaceName FROM `delivery_receitp` dr LEFT JOIN `person_user` pu on dr.`interface_id` =pu.`id` WHERE dr.`status`= 1 and dr.`city_id` =#{cityId} AND dr.submit_time is null order by dr.updated_time desc, dr.created_time DESC LIMIT 999999)
UNION ALL
(SELECT dr.*,pu.`user_name` interfaceName FROM `delivery_receitp` dr LEFT JOIN `person_user` pu on dr.`interface_id` =pu.`id` WHERE dr.`status`= 1 and dr.`city_id` =#{cityId} AND dr.submit_time is not null order by dr.submit_time desc LIMIT 999999)

(SELECT * FROM `delivery_receitp` WHERE `status` =1 and `city_id` =#{cityId} and interface_id = #{id} AND submit_time is null order by updated_time desc, created_time DESC LIMIT 999999) UNION ALL (SELECT * FROM `delivery_receitp` WHERE `status` =1 and `city_id` =#{cityId} and interface_id = #{id} AND submit_time is not null order by submit_time desc LIMIT 999999)

(SELECT dr.*, pu.`user_name` interfaceName, cr.`name` regionName FROM `delivery_receitp` dr LEFT JOIN `person_user` pu on dr.`interface_id`= pu.`id` LEFT JOIN `city_region` cr on dr.`region_id`= cr.`id` WHERE dr.`status`= 1 AND iscommit = 1 and dr.`city_id`= #{cityId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.`submit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.`submit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND pu.user_name LIKE '%${linkName}%'
AND (dr.`user_name` LIKE '%${userName}%' or dr.`company_name` LIKE '%${userName}%')
AND dr.iscommit = 1
AND dr.iscommit = 2
AND dr.iscommit = 3
AND dr.unqualifiedNum = 0
AND dr.unqualifiedNum is NOT NULL AND dr.unqualifiedNum > 0
order by dr.created_time desc limit 999999999) UNION ALL (SELECT dr.*, pu.`user_name` interfaceName, cr.`name` regionName FROM `delivery_receitp` dr LEFT JOIN `person_user` pu on dr.`interface_id`= pu.`id` LEFT JOIN `city_region` cr on dr.`region_id`= cr.`id` WHERE dr.`status`= 1 AND iscommit != 1 and dr.`city_id`= #{cityId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.`submit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.`submit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND pu.user_name LIKE '%${linkName}%'
AND (dr.`user_name` LIKE '%${userName}%' or dr.`company_name` LIKE '%${userName}%')
AND dr.iscommit = 1
AND dr.iscommit = 2
AND dr.iscommit = 3
AND 0 = dr.unqualifiedNum
AND dr.unqualifiedNum is NOT NULL AND dr.unqualifiedNum > 0
order by dr.submit_time desc limit 999999999)
SELECT ifnull(SUM(`shop_num`),0) FROM `delivery_receitp` where `status`= 1 AND isvxvip != 1 and `city_id`= #{cityId} and date_format(`submit_time`, '%Y-%m-%d')= date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT ifnull(SUM(`shop_num`),0) FROM `delivery_receitp` where `status`= 1 AND isvxvip != 1 and `city_id`= #{cityId} and date_format(`submit_time`, '%Y-%m-%d')= date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') and `interface_id` in
#{item}

(SELECT dr.*,pu.`user_name` interfaceName FROM `delivery_receitp` dr LEFT JOIN `person_user` pu on dr.`interface_id` =pu.`id` WHERE dr.`status`= 1 and dr.`city_id` =#{cityId} AND submit_time is null and dr.`interface_id` in
#{item}
order by dr.updated_time desc, dr.submit_time desc LIMIT 999999)
UNION ALL
(SELECT dr.*,pu.`user_name` interfaceName FROM `delivery_receitp` dr LEFT JOIN `person_user` pu on dr.`interface_id` =pu.`id` WHERE dr.`status`= 1 and dr.`city_id` =#{cityId} AND submit_time is not null and dr.`interface_id` in
#{item}
order by dr.submit_time desc LIMIT 999999)

SELECT ifnull(SUM(`shop_num`),0) FROM `delivery_receitp` where `status`= 1 and iscommit >= 2 and `city_id`= #{cityId} and date_format(`submit_time`, '%Y-%m')= date_format(now(), '%Y-%m') and `interface_id` in
#{item}

SELECT SUM(num) num, SUM(passNum) passNum, SUM(unpassNum) unpassNum, SUM(checkingNum) checkingNum FROM ( SELECT SUM(shop_num) num, 0 passNum, 0 unpassNum, 0 checkingNum FROM delivery_receitp dr LEFT JOIN `person_user` pu on dr.`interface_id`= pu.`id` LEFT JOIN `city_region` cr on dr.`region_id`= cr.`id` WHERE dr.`status`= 1 and dr.`city_id` = #{cityId} AND iscommit != 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.`submit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.`submit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND pu.user_name LIKE '%${linkName}%'
AND (dr.`user_name` LIKE '%${userName}%' or dr.`company_name` LIKE '%${userName}%')
AND dr.iscommit = 1
AND dr.iscommit = 2
AND dr.iscommit = 3
AND 0 = dr.unqualifiedNum
AND dr.unqualifiedNum is NOT NULL AND dr.unqualifiedNum > 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 0, SUM(shop_num) passNum, 0, 0 FROM delivery_receitp dr LEFT JOIN `person_user` pu on dr.`interface_id`= pu.`id` LEFT JOIN `city_region` cr on dr.`region_id`= cr.`id` WHERE dr.`status`= 1 and dr.`city_id` = #{cityId} AND iscommit != 1 and dr.unqualifiedNum = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.`submit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.`submit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND pu.user_name LIKE '%${linkName}%'
AND (dr.`user_name` LIKE '%${userName}%' or dr.`company_name` LIKE '%${userName}%')
AND dr.iscommit = 1
AND dr.iscommit = 2
AND dr.iscommit = 3
AND 0 = dr.unqualifiedNum
AND dr.unqualifiedNum is NOT NULL AND dr.unqualifiedNum > 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 0, SUM(shop_num) - sum(unqualifiedNum), SUM(unqualifiedNum), 0 FROM delivery_receitp dr WHERE dr.`status`= 1 and dr.`city_id` = #{cityId} AND iscommit != 1 AND dr.unqualifiedNum > 0
AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.`submit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.`submit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND pu.user_name LIKE '%${linkName}%'
AND (dr.`user_name` LIKE '%${userName}%' or dr.`company_name` LIKE '%${userName}%')
AND dr.iscommit = 1
AND dr.iscommit = 2
AND dr.iscommit = 3
AND 0 = dr.unqualifiedNum
AND dr.unqualifiedNum is NOT NULL AND dr.unqualifiedNum > 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 0, 0, 0, SUM(shop_num) FROM delivery_receitp dr WHERE dr.`status`= 1 and dr.`city_id` = #{cityId} AND dr.isvxvip != 1 AND dr.isvxvip is not null AND dr.iscommit = 2
AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.`submit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.`submit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND pu.user_name LIKE '%${linkName}%'
AND (dr.`user_name` LIKE '%${userName}%' or dr.`company_name` LIKE '%${userName}%')
AND dr.iscommit = 1
AND dr.iscommit = 2
AND dr.iscommit = 3
AND 0 = dr.unqualifiedNum
AND dr.unqualifiedNum is NOT NULL AND dr.unqualifiedNum > 0
) t
